parameters.query: SELECT DISTINCT id FROM camara_v2.partidos
SELECT split(uri, '/')[7] FROM camara_v2.deputados

SELECT DISTINCT identificacaomateria.codigomateria AS id FROM senado.proposicoes_tramitadas_periodo WHERE date_parse(dataultimaatualizacao, '%(date_format)s') > date_parse('2019-01-31 00:00:00', '%(date_format)s') AND identificacaomateria.codigomateria NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT identificacaomateria.codigomateria FROM senado.proposicoes)

WITH d AS (SELECT distinct identificacaomateria.codigomateria as id FROM senado.proposicoes_lista) SELECT id FROM d WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT distinct identificacaomateria.codigomateria FROM senado.proposicoes)

SELECT identificacaomateria.codigomateria as id FROM senado.proposicoes_tramitadas_periodo WHERE date_diff('minute', date_parse(dataultimaatualizacao, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3', '%(date_format)s'), '%(date_format)s')) < 60

SELECT identificacaomateria.codigomateria as id FROM senado.proposicoes_tramitadas_periodo WHERE date_diff('day', date_parse(dataultimaatualizacao, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3', '%(date_format)s'), '%(date_format)s')) < 15
SELECT split(uri, '/')[7] FROM camara_v2.deputados
SELECT split(uri, '/')[7] FROM camara_v2.deputados WHERE idlegislaturafinal = 56
SELECT id FROM camara_v2.eventos WHERE date_diff('day', current_timestamp, date_parse( datahorainicio, '%(date_format)s')) > -10

SELECT DISTINCT codproposicao FROM camara_v1.proposicoes_tramitadas_periodo WHERE  date_diff('minute',  date_parse(dataalteracao, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3', '%(date_format1)s'), '%(date_format1)s')) < 60

SELECT DISTINCT codproposicao FROM camara_v1.proposicoes_tramitadas_periodo WHERE  date_diff('day',  date_parse(dataalteracao, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3', '%(date_format1)s'), '%(date_format1)s')) < 15

WITH d AS (SELECT CAST(codproposicao as integer) codproposicao FROM camara_v1.proposicoes_votadas_plenario WHERE  date_diff('day',  date_parse(datavotacao, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'America/Sao_Paulo', '%(date_format1)s'), '%(date_format1)s')) < 100) SELECT DISTINCT siglatipo, numero, ano FROM d JOIN camara_v2.proposicoes t1 ON t1.id = d.codproposicao;
SELECT DISTINCT siglatipo, numero, ano FROM camara_v1.proposicoes_votadas_plenario AS t1 JOIN camara_v2.proposicoes AS t2 ON t2.id = CAST(t1.codproposicao AS INTEGER)
SELECT idlegislatura as id FROM camara_v2.legislaturas
SELECT '2020-06-01' AS data_ini, '2020-06-10' AS data_fim, Codigo_Parlamentar AS camara_id, twitter_id FROM `gabinete-compartilhado.redes_sociais.perfil_twitter_deputados`

SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%(date_format)s', DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS data_ini, FORMAT_DATE('%(date_format)s', DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS data_fim, Codigo_Parlamentar AS camara_id, twitter_id FROM `gabinete-compartilhado.redes_sociais.perfil_twitter_deputados`

SELECT id, data FROM camara_v2.votacoes WHERE date_diff('day', date_parse(data, '%(date_format)s'), date_parse(date_format(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3', '%(date_format)s'), '%(date_format)s')) <= 2
SELECT id, data FROM camara_v2.votacoes WHERE date_parse(data, '%(date_format)s') > date_parse('2019-01-01', '%(date_format)s')
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(id AS varchar) FROM camara_v2.proposicoes WHERE CAST(id AS varchar) NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT(api_url, '/')[7] FROM camara_v2.tramitacoes)
